last_episode_to_air.name: $10 Million Reward
last_episode_to_air.overview: An informant and a sting operation open up new avenues in the investigation, which federal agents follow to the home of a small-time mobster.

name: This Is a Robbery: The World's Biggest Art Heist
original_name: This Is a Robbery: The World's Biggest Art Heist
overview: In 1990, two men dressed as cops con their way into a Boston museum and steal a fortune in art. Take a deep dive into this daring and notorious crime.

episodes.name: They Looked Like Cops
episodes.overview: A museum guard buzzes in two men dressed as cops, who vanish 81 minutes later with a priceless Rembrandt and a dozen other works of art.

episodes.name: Vipers in the Grass
episodes.overview: Was the heist an inside job? As law enforcement scrutinizes the museum's security measures, a suspect emerges, but missteps hinder the investigation.

episodes.name: We've Seen It
episodes.overview: Amid apparent sightings of the stolen art, criminal activity connected to organized crime leads to possible perpetrators and a motive for the robbery.

episodes.name: $10 Million Reward
episodes.overview: An informant and a sting operation open up new avenues in the investigation, which federal agents follow to the home of a small-time mobster.
